original_title: Take It Easy For A Little While
overview: Take It Easy For A Little While is a short, introspective film detailing the mind of an obsessive one-hit-wonder, trying to make a name for themselves musically. Mark, a middle-aged sellout, is trying to write an album to verify his integrity as a songwriter and musician, but writer's block is plaguing his creative process. Lack of proper sleep and intense stress cause hallucinations for Mark, of which then become the inspiration for his songs.
title: Take It Easy For A Little While
